text: "Midnight at the Lost and Found" is a single by Meat Loaf released in 1983. It is from the album Midnight at the Lost and Found. == Track listing == # "Midnight at the Lost and Found" (Remix) # "Fallen Angel" (Remix) # "Bat Out of Hell" (Live Version) # "Dead Ringer for Love" (Long Version) == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |- !
